name: GammaJam
description:
In this high octane, synth-wave versus game, compete against a friend or foe to be the first to make it to the finish! Take turns as the Runner and Bigman, as you try to beat your opponent at their own game! While one player, the Runner, makes their way through the platforming stage, the other, the Bigman, will get an array of random enemies and attacks to sabotage the Runner. If the Runner is taken out by one of the Bigman's traps, they immediately swap roles! First Runner to make it to the finish is the winner!

CREDITS

Conner Sweeney 

Ross Magargee 

Giovani Tejeda 

Ashley Jones 

And all our friends who playtested!
